list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, thin, flat piece of wood or other hard material, used for floors or other building purposes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: loose boards creaked as I walked on them
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bảng lỏng lẻo ọp ẹp khi tôi bước vào họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin, flat piece of wood or other stiff material used for various purposes.
a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he sits on the board of directors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ngồi vào hội đồng quản trị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the provision of regular meals when one stays somewhere, in return for payment or services.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: your room and board will be free
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phòng và bảng của bạn sẽ được miễn phí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a distance covered by a vessel in a single tack.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we were tacking up to the anchor, shortening cable at each board
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã giải quyết với neo, rút ngắn cáp ở mỗi bảng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: get on or into (a ship, aircraft, or other vehicle).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we boarded the plane for Oslo
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi lên máy bay cho Oslo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: live and receive regular meals in a house in return for payment or services.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cousins boarded for a while with Ruby
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh em họ lên máy bay một lúc với Ruby

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover or seal a window, storefront, or other structure with pieces of wood.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shop was still boarded up
when we're not boarding, we're skiing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi chúng ta không nội trú, chúng ta đang trượt tuyết
